name: Asteroid Miner (Bitter Jam)
description:
Made for the 60-hour game jam "Bitter Jam," Asteroid Miner is a game where you shoot asteroids to upgrade your ship to fight enemies and collect fragments of your communication device.

In Bitter Jam, games had to abide by these rules:

  • Use only the assets provided to you, without modifying them.
  • Ensure that no assets overlap
  • Put all assets on a grid

Goal: Collect all 8 communication fragments to win.

Because the Bitter Jam assets did not provide any text elements, here is a tutorial on how to play:
